title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin and explains why Jimmy Garoppolo staying with the 49ers to back up Trey Lance is the right move for everyone involved. He questions Lamar Jackson's approach in trying to land a new contract but sees how this will end up in his favor. Plus, college football analyst Danny Kanell joins the show to tell Doug what to expect from Miami this season and if Ohio State is the top national contender this year next to Alabama. 

#gottliebshow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
